IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.update_equip_upgrade_rate') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.update_equip_upgrade_rate GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.update_equip_upgrade_rate @inventory_id dbo.id_t, @upgrade_rate SMALLINT AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
UPDATE dbo.EquipItemInfos SET upgrade_rate = @upgrade_rate WHERE inventory_id = @inventory_id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
